description: Returns information that DataSync Discovery collects about resources in your on-premises storage system.

parameters.name: DiscoveryJobArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the discovery job that's collecting data from your on-premises storage system.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: Specifies what kind of storage system resources that you want information about.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: Specifies the universally unique identifiers (UUIDs) of the storage system resources that you want information about. You can't use this parameter in combination with the Filter parameter. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Filters the storage system resources that you want returned. For example, this might be volumes associated with a specific storage virtual machine (SVM). (string) --- (list) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceDetails
nested_items.description: The information collected about your storage system's resources. A response can also include Amazon Web Services storage service recommendations.

nested_items.name: NetAppONTAPSVMs
nested_items.description: The information that DataSync Discovery collects about storage virtual machines (SVMs) in your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: ClusterUuid
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the cluster associated with the SVM.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The UUID of the SVM.

nested_items.name: SvmName
nested_items.description: The name of the SVM.

nested_items.name: CifsShareCount
nested_items.description: The number of CIFS shares in the SVM.

nested_items.name: EnabledProtocols
nested_items.description: The data transfer protocols (such as NFS) configured for the SVM.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TotalCapacityUsed
nested_items.description: The storage space that's being used in the SVM.

nested_items.name: TotalCapacityProvisioned
nested_items.description: The total storage space that's available in the SVM.

nested_items.name: TotalLogicalCapacityUsed
nested_items.description: The storage space that's being used in the SVM without accounting for compression or deduplication.

nested_items.name: MaxP95Performance
nested_items.description: The performance data that DataSync Discovery collects about the SVM.

nested_items.name: IopsRead
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS related to read operations.

nested_items.name: IopsWrite
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS related to write operations.

nested_items.name: IopsOther
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: IopsTotal
nested_items.description: Peak total IOPS on your on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: ThroughputRead
nested_items.description: Peak throughput related to read operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputWrite
nested_items.description: Peak throughput related to write operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputOther
nested_items.description: Peak throughput unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputTotal
nested_items.description: Peak total throughput on your on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: LatencyRead
nested_items.description: Peak latency for read operations.

nested_items.name: LatencyWrite
nested_items.description: Peak latency for write operations.

nested_items.name: LatencyOther
nested_items.description: Peak latency for operations unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: Recommendations
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services storage services that DataSync Discovery recommends for the SVM. For more information, see Recommendations provided by DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: A recommended Amazon Web Services storage service that you can migrate data to based on information that DataSync Discovery collects about your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: StorageConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about how you can set up a recommended Amazon Web Services storage service.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EstimatedMonthlyStorageCost
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly cost of the recommended Amazon Web Services storage service.

nested_items.name: NfsExportedVolumes
nested_items.description: The number of NFS volumes in the SVM.

nested_items.name: RecommendationStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates whether DataSync Discovery recommendations for the SVM are ready to view, incomplete, or can't be determined.

nested_items.name: TotalSnapshotCapacityUsed
nested_items.description: The amount of storage in the SVM that's being used for snapshots.

nested_items.name: LunCount
nested_items.description: The number of LUNs (logical unit numbers) in the SVM.

nested_items.name: NetAppONTAPVolumes
nested_items.description: The information that DataSync Discovery collects about volumes in your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: VolumeName
nested_items.description: The name of the volume.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the volume.

nested_items.name: CifsShareCount
nested_items.description: The number of CIFS shares in the volume.

nested_items.name: SecurityStyle
nested_items.description: The volume's security style (such as Unix or NTFS).

nested_items.name: SvmUuid
nested_items.description: The UUID of the storage virtual machine (SVM) associated with the volume.

nested_items.name: SvmName
nested_items.description: The name of the SVM associated with the volume.

nested_items.name: CapacityUsed
nested_items.description: The storage space that's being used in the volume.

nested_items.name: CapacityProvisioned
nested_items.description: The total storage space that's available in the volume.

nested_items.name: LogicalCapacityUsed
nested_items.description: The storage space that's being used in the volume without accounting for compression or deduplication.

nested_items.name: NfsExported
nested_items.description: The number of NFS volumes in the volume.

nested_items.name: SnapshotCapacityUsed
nested_items.description: The amount of storage in the volume that's being used for snapshots.

nested_items.name: MaxP95Performance
nested_items.description: The performance data that DataSync Discovery collects about the volume.

nested_items.name: IopsRead
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS related to read operations.

nested_items.name: IopsWrite
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS related to write operations.

nested_items.name: IopsOther
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: IopsTotal
nested_items.description: Peak total IOPS on your on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: ThroughputRead
nested_items.description: Peak throughput related to read operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputWrite
nested_items.description: Peak throughput related to write operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputOther
nested_items.description: Peak throughput unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputTotal
nested_items.description: Peak total throughput on your on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: LatencyRead
nested_items.description: Peak latency for read operations.

nested_items.name: LatencyWrite
nested_items.description: Peak latency for write operations.

nested_items.name: LatencyOther
nested_items.description: Peak latency for operations unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: Recommendations
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services storage services that DataSync Discovery recommends for the volume. For more information, see Recommendations provided by DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: A recommended Amazon Web Services storage service that you can migrate data to based on information that DataSync Discovery collects about your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: StorageConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about how you can set up a recommended Amazon Web Services storage service.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EstimatedMonthlyStorageCost
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly cost of the recommended Amazon Web Services storage service.

nested_items.name: RecommendationStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates whether DataSync Discovery recommendations for the volume are ready to view, incomplete, or can't be determined.

nested_items.name: LunCount
nested_items.description: The number of LUNs (logical unit numbers) in the volume.

nested_items.name: NetAppONTAPClusters
nested_items.description: The information that DataSync Discovery collects about the cluster in your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: CifsShareCount
nested_items.description: The number of CIFS shares in the cluster.

nested_items.name: NfsExportedVolumes
nested_items.description: The number of NFS volumes in the cluster.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterName
nested_items.description: The name of the cluster.

nested_items.name: MaxP95Performance
nested_items.description: The performance data that DataSync Discovery collects about the cluster.

nested_items.name: IopsRead
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS related to read operations.

nested_items.name: IopsWrite
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS related to write operations.

nested_items.name: IopsOther
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: IopsTotal
nested_items.description: Peak total IOPS on your on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: ThroughputRead
nested_items.description: Peak throughput related to read operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputWrite
nested_items.description: Peak throughput related to write operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputOther
nested_items.description: Peak throughput unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: ThroughputTotal
nested_items.description: Peak total throughput on your on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: LatencyRead
nested_items.description: Peak latency for read operations.

nested_items.name: LatencyWrite
nested_items.description: Peak latency for write operations.

nested_items.name: LatencyOther
nested_items.description: Peak latency for operations unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: ClusterBlockStorageSize
nested_items.description: The total storage space that's available in the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterBlockStorageUsed
nested_items.description: The storage space that's being used in a cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterBlockStorageLogicalUsed
nested_items.description: The storage space that's being used in the cluster without accounting for compression or deduplication.

nested_items.name: Recommendations
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services storage services that DataSync Discovery recommends for the cluster. For more information, see Recommendations provided by DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: A recommended Amazon Web Services storage service that you can migrate data to based on information that DataSync Discovery collects about your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: StorageConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about how you can set up a recommended Amazon Web Services storage service.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EstimatedMonthlyStorageCost
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly cost of the recommended Amazon Web Services storage service.

nested_items.name: RecommendationStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates whether DataSync Discovery recommendations for the cluster are ready to view, incomplete, or can't be determined.

nested_items.name: LunCount
nested_items.description: The number of LUNs (logical unit numbers) in the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterCloudStorageUsed
nested_items.description: The amount of space in the cluster that's in cloud storage (for example, if you're using data tiering).

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The opaque string that indicates the position to begin the next list of results in the response.
